00001 def crowded_tournament(fronts, random):
00002     '''
00003     Now: Create mating pool.
00004     Later: return single individual.
00005     '''
00006     mating_pool = []
00007     solPairs = []
00008 
00009     front1 = random.randint(0, len(fronts)-1)
00010     front2 = random.randint(0, len(fronts)-1)
00011 
00012     ind1_index = random.randint(0, len(fronts[front1])-1)
00013     ind2_index = random.randint(0, len(fronts[front2])-1)
00014     ind1 = fronts[front1][ind1_index]
00015     ind2 = fronts[front2][ind2_index]
00016 
00017     if ind1.rank < ind2.rank:
00018         return ind1
00019     elif ind1.rank > ind2.rank:
00020         return ind2
00021     else:
00022         if ind1.crowded_distance > ind2.crowded_distance:
00023             return ind1
00024         else:
00025             return ind2
